A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An interesting development in the Star Wars Saga.  A long movie of which I have no problems\, however the Casino sequence was unnecessary except for developing the Finn and Rosie characters.  The fight and battle scenes were excellent especially the Ben/Rey/Snoke scene.  I like the direction and where the trilogy is going. it's good to see the departure of Luke and hopefully soon Leia will follow. These characters need to carry story line on their own and look forward to see how it develops.
